document.full_text: chicago's derrick rose was in mvp mode on friday scoring a career-high 44 points to lead the bulls to a 99-82 win over the atlanta hawks in game three of their nba playoff series at the philips arena.
document.title: rose leads bulls to rout of hawks, chicago up 2-1
lines_and_colors: chicago's derrick rose was in mvp mode on friday scoring a career-high 44 points to lead the bulls to a 99-82 win over the atlanta hawks in game three of their nba playoff series at the philips arena.
